useCase.name: Display Rooms List of an EnergyGrid

mainSequence.step: Admin displays rooms list of an EnergyGrid.
MainUI displays rooms list of an EnergyGrid.
HouseConfigurationUI requests Geographic Area Name.
Admin inserts data (Geographic Area name).
MainUI sets data (Geographic Area name).
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in list.
GeographicAreaList checks if name is contained in list.
GeographicArea matches by name and validates data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (Geographic Area).
Admin requests House Name.
Admin inserts data (House name).
MainUI sets data (House name).
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in list.
HouseList checks if name is contained in list.
House matches by name and validates data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (House).
Admin requests Energy Grid Name.
Admin inserts data (Energy Grid Name).
MainUI sets data (Energy Grid Name).
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in list.
EnergyGridList checks if name is contained in list.
EnergyGrid matches by name and validates data.
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (EnergyGrid).
HouseConfigurationController gets data from EnergyGrid (Room list).
EnergyGrid getsRoomList().
RoomList validates data and builds String.
HouseConfigurationUI displays list of rooms of the EnergyGrid.
